Attack Spells.Name: Boomerang
Attack Spells.Info: A shot that comes back to the caster. Passes through any targets it comes in contact with.

Attack Spells.Name: Wind Slash
Attack Spells.Info: Three slashes of wind are fired off in three different directions.

Attack Spells.Name: Homing Lasers
Attack Spells.Info: Rapidly fires laser shots at the enemy that home into their position. Has a chance of passing through the target to home back into them a second time.

Defence Spells.Name: Absolute Barrier
Defence Spells.Info: Encases the caster in an indestructible sphere for 10 seconds. All damage is nullified for this duration.

Defence Spells.Name: Absolute Reflection
Defence Spells.Info: Reflects all damage recieved for the next 4 seconds back to the target(s). For the duration of this spell, the caster will be unable to use their other spells.

Defence Spells.Name: Healing
Defence Spells.Info: Refills the casters health completely, and applies 3 seconds of invulnerability as well. Does not recharge during battle.
